data.title: Vol. 10 No. 3 (2015): Issues in Ethnology and Anthropology: Thematic Issue - Archaeology
data.text:
We welcome authors, readers, scientists and general public to search our archives and search for articles about ethnological, anthropological, archaeological, folklor, cultural studies and other humanities topics.

Journal Issues in Ethnology & Anthropology was established in 1987. Since 2006, it is coming out as a new series. Since 2011, it has published 4 issues per year.

Please find more information about our journal.

The journal is co-funded by

Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development of the Republic of Serbia

Faculty of Philosophy, University of Belgrade

Serbian Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development classifies Etnoantropološke probleme / Issues in Ethnology and Anthropology as national journal with international significance (M24)

http://www.mpn.gov.rs/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/knc-2018.pdf

From 2021. Ministry od Education, Science and Technological Development RS classify Etnoantropološke probleme / Issues inEthnology and Anthropology as "international journal" (M23). https://kobson.nb.rs/upload/documents/MNTR/Kategorizacija_casopisa/2021/MNTR2021-istorija_arheologija_etnologija.pdf
